title: Line 3 (Hefei Metro)
text:
Line 3 of <a href="Hefei%20Metro">Hefei Metro</a> () is a <a href="rapid%20transit">metro</a> line in <a href="Hefei">Hefei</a>. The line opened on 26 December 2019.
Future Development.
A southern extension was approved by the NDRC. The extension is 11.25 km in length.
